subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Left-hander Jason Vargas will face stiff competition for a rotation spot this spring. But they way he sees it, the Mets did not give up two hard-throwing relievers to acquire Vargas simply to cast him aside.
snippet: Left-hander Jason Vargas will face stiff competition for a rotation spot this spring. But they way he sees it, the Mets did not give up two hard-throwing relievers to acquire Vargas simply to cast him aside.
